title: Saudis to Unveil Updated Strategy for $2 Trillion Economic Plan
description: Saudi Arabia plans to release an updated strategy for Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s $2 trillion economic diversification agenda as the kingdom adjusts its policies and spending priorities amid fiscal pressures.
content: Saudi Arabia plans to release an updated strategy for Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s $2 trillion economic diversification agenda as the kingdom adjusts its policies and spending priorities amid fiscal pressures.
